ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Glory be to Allah above what they describe -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God is too glorious for what they ascribe to Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (They say): “Exalted be Allah above what they attribute to Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is too glorious to be described as they describe Him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Purity is to Allah from the matters they fabricate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Glorified be Allah! (He is free) from what they attribute unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Glory be to Allah (for freedom) from what they describe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Glory be to God above that they describe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Glorified be Allah from that which they attribute (unto Him),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God is far above what they attribute to Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Hallowed be Allah from that which they ascribe to Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Clear is Allah of whatever they allege [about Him]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Glory to Allah! (He is free) from the things they ascribe (to Him)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Glorified is Allah! (He is Free) from what they attribute unto Him!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Exaltations to Allah above what they describe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God be glorified, far above what they allege.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:159] Glory be to God, affirming that He is exalted, above what they attribute, [to Him] in the way of His having a child,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Glorified be Allah) Allah exonerates Himself (from that which they attribute (unto Him)) from the lies they attribute to Him,
